mapper.select: SELECT M.member_id, M.mem_password, M.mem_name, M.mem_zip_code, M.mem_address_detail, M.mem_email, M.mem_phone, M.mem_hire_date, M.mem_left_date, M.mem_is_active, M.dept_code, M.position_code, P.mem_position_sequence FROM member M LEFT JOIN member_dept D ON M.dept_code = D.member_dept_code LEFT JOIN member_position P ON M.position_code = P.member_position_code ORDER BY mem_is_active DESC, CASE WHEN M.member_id = 999999 OR M.position_code = 99 THEN 0 WHEN M.position_code = 17 THEN 999 ELSE P.mem_position_sequence END ASC, M.mem_hire_date ASC
SELECT MAX(member_id) FROM member WHERE member_id LIKE CONCAT(#{prefix}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_id, mem_password, mem_name, mem_zip_code, mem_address, mem_address_detail, mem_email, mem_phone, mem_hire_date, mem_is_active, dept_code, position_code) VALUES (#{memberId}, 1234, #{memName}, #{memZipCode}, #{memAddress}, #{memAddressDetail}, #{memEmail}, #{memPhone}, #{memHireDate}, 1, #{deptCode}, #{positionCode})
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET mem_zip_code = #{memZipCode}, mem_address = #{memAddress}, mem_address_detail = #{memAddressDetail}, mem_email = #{memEmail}, mem_phone = #{memPhone}, dept_code = #{deptCode}, position_code = #{positionCode} WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT m.member_id, m.mem_name FROM member m LEFT JOIN store s ON m.member_id = s.member_id WHERE m.mem_name LIKE CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%') AND s.member_id IS NULL AND m.member_id LIKE '2%'
